%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
Reference Note B: MOOP for Individuals on Family Plans

Note: This mandate applies 1) to NGF plans only and 2) for Non-Embedded plans only.
Note: This mandate does not apply to 1) GF plans, 2) Exempt plans or 3) Embedded plans. 

For all group business (including ASO): the CY 2020 maximum OOP for an individual (in any plan) will be $8,150.

If their CDH plan is embedded already OR if their plan is non-embedded with a family OOP of less than $8,150, then they don’t have to change anything.

If their CDH plan is non-embedded today AND their family OOP Max is greater than $8,150, they need to change their plan design for 01/01/20:

1. Keep it non-embedded but lower their family OOP max to $8,150.                                   
2. Change it to embedded. No min deductible for HRA, but there is a min deductible for an embedded HSA plan of $2,800 for an individual.
